name: Superunit
long_description:
Superunit is an AI-powered accounting and product operations platform for companies selling physical goods, solving the challenge of expensive bookkeepers, inaccurate books, and disconnected ops.

We reduce costs and balance sheet errors by automating bookkeeping, supply chain management, inventory costs, and contribution margin analysis.  Our system seamlessly integrates with Quickbooks and ERP systems, eliminating manual data entry and minimizing errors.

Users can interact with Superunit via Slack or email, avoiding the need to learn new software.

(https://www.loom.com/share/1425f6802d774e1aa00a8ac4b64782ff)
one_liner: AI accounting and ops agent for companies selling physical goods
